CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_age INT,
    therapist_id UUID,
    therapy_type VARCHAR(50),
    progress_report TEXT
)

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE patients (
   patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(50),
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   therapist_id INT
);
CREATE TABLE progress_reports (
   report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_id INT,
   date DATE,
   progress VARCHAR(200),
   FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

   patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   therapy_start_date DATE
);

   patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
   session_date DATE,
   duration_minutes INT,
   therapist_name VARCHAR(50)
);

   report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
   report_date DATE,
   mood VARCHAR(20),
   progress_notes TEXT
);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10)
);


CREATE TABLE Therapists (
  therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
  therapist_specialty VARCHAR(50)
);


CREATE TABLE Sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date DATE,
  patient_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES Therapists(therapist_id)
);


CREATE TABLE ProgressReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  report_text TEXT,
  report_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES Sessions(session_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES Therapists(therapist_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Patients SET patient_age = 30 WHERE patient_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),

  patient_gender VARCHAR(10)
);


CREATE TABLE Therapists (
  therapist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
  therapist_specialty VARCHAR(50)
);


CREATE TABLE Sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date DATE,
  patient_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES Therapists(therapist_id)
);


CREATE TABLE ProgressReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  report_text TEXT,
  report_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES Sessions(session_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES Therapists(therapist_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Therapists SET therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith' WHERE therapist_id = 2;
